title: Officium quotidianum: or, A manual of private devotions By the most reverend father in God Dr. William Laud late Lord Arch-bishop of Canterbury.
author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.
publisher: printed for Robert Crofts at the Crown in Chancery-lane,
